column1: Tweets
1. "EVs convert over 77% of electrical energy into motion, compared to 12-30% for gasoline cars. #Efficiency"
2. "EV motors have only 20 moving parts vs. 2,000+ in gas engines. That’s simplicity at its finest. #ElectricVehicles"
3. "The world’s best-selling EV? The Tesla Model Y, leading the charge toward a cleaner future. 🚗⚡ #EVFacts"
4. "Electric cars first appeared in the 1800s, but today’s models are light-years ahead. #Throwback #EVHistory"
5. "EVs can run on renewable energy, making them truly zero-emission vehicles. 🌱 #SustainableDriving"
